name: Rouge Ace of spades
description:
This game was made for Jame gam #26

Theme you are the monster: So instead of giving yourself upgrades you upgrade you enemy so you are the monster.

Special object Cards: The upgrades are card you have to chose between and all enemies are card themed.

You have 3 lives. When you get hit 3 times you die and your score is revealed. The score is the total amont of card bounces.

Movement: Arrow keys

I would love to see what highscores you can achieve. The current best scores at 264 by FredeIDK (screenshot in chat).

The soundtrack was made by alexander nakarad. The sound effects are done by me tho.
